name: BAFL - Brakes Are For Losers
description: BAFL is all about pure arcade fun. Challenge your friends, pick a funky car and outrun them with your driving skills and dirty tricks. Ram them out of your way or pick up bonuses to wreck them.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: 3 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 5700 Series equivalent or more DirectX: Version 9.0c
